about_the_game:
This is a pixel art style 3D model resource pack with a forest theme.
The various data such as trees, plants, log houses, and terrain are created in a style reminiscent of 90's JRPGs, and this resource pack is recommended for those who want to create games with retro elements.

[PixelScape Forest Pack] Contents

- 3D Stamps: 47
Log Houses 3 types (including 2 variations)
Door 1 type
Decoration 8 types
Trees 4 types (including 2 variations)
Plant Species 25 types
Stones 6 types

Terrains: 104

Sample Maps: 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: "Pixel Scapes Forest" is a forest-themed 3D model resource pack in pixel art style. Trees, plants, log houses, and various terrain models are created in a style reminiscent of 90s JRPGs, It is perfect for creating artwork for players who enjoy retro games.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
